articles.title: WoW Has Good News for Players Who Missed WoW Remix: Mists of Pandaria
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: World of Warcraft Patch 11.1 introduces a new vendor. This vendor will sell items previously available in WoW Remix: Mists of Pandaria.

articles.title: The Leading Safety Razor Brand Van Der Hagen, Introduces the new V Razor, Offering a state of the art shaving design
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Van Der Hagen launched the new V Razor, a safety razor designed for comfort and easy blade changes. The razor features an ergonometric handle, weighs 3.2oz, and comes with 5 Ice Tempered German blade replacements. It is available online and will be available in retailers nationwide.

articles.title: The Leading Safety Razor Brand Van Der Hagen, Introduces the new V Razor, Offering a state of the art shaving design
articles.author: Van Der Hagen
articles.summary: Van Der Hagen, a leading safety razor brand, has launched its new V Razor. This product features a state-of-the-art shaving design.

articles.title: Nintendo's new Switch 2 console to come out in 2025
articles.author: Asahi News
articles.summary: Nintendo revealed its newest console, the Nintendo Switch 2. It is a successor to the Nintendo Switch.

articles.title: Pahang to develop AI data centre for agricultural products
articles.author: Bernama
articles.summary: The Pahang government, through the Pahang State Development Corporation (PKNP), plans to develop an Artificial Intelligence Data Centre (AIDC) to serve as a new online business platform for agricultural products, with implementation expected to begin in January 2026. This project aims to market local agricultural products domestically and globally by leveraging public computing and artificial intelligence technologies.

articles.title: Innovation pavilion: Startups make their mark at Numaish
articles.author: Ashresh Marupaka
articles.summary: The Numaish exhibition featured an 'Innovation Pavilion' where startups showcased their products. Newkind introduced sustainable menstrual solutions, Pheezee presented a physiotherapy pain detection device, Alkaione displayed its alkaline water processing system, and Switcheko addressed plastic waste recycling. These startups were given direct exposure at the event.

articles.title: XYZVerse could be the second chance for those who missed Bitcoin
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: XYZVerse is offering a new opportunity with high growth potential, implying the introduction of a service or product.

articles.title: Amazon has the 4x sold-out Ninja SLUSHi in stock and it'll ship next week
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Ninja is launching the Ninja SLUSHi, featuring RapidChill Technology that transforms liquids into frozen treats in 15 minutes. The SLUSHi models (88 and 72-ounce) operate similarly, offering restaurant-quality dispensing with easy-to-clean parts and a Rinse Cycle.

articles.title: Amazon has the 4x sold-out Ninja SLUSHi in stock and it'll ship next week
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Ninja's SLUSHi Professional Frozen Drink Maker is currently in stock at Amazon and Walmart. The 88 Oz. model is available for $439 at Amazon, while the 72 Oz. version is $370. The SLUSHi uses RapidChill Technology to transform liquids into frozen treats in 15 minutes, offering different preset options for various beverages.

articles.title: Starbox Unveils StarboxAI-IntelliContentCreate, an AI-Powered Content Creation Platform, to Support 180 Degrees Brandcom in its Advertising Business  Jan. 16, 2025 22:00
articles.summary: Starbox Group Holdings Ltd. has launched StarboxAI-IntelliContentCreate, an AI-powered content creation platform, through its subsidiary, Starbox Technologies Sdn. Bhd. The platform aims to improve content generation for businesses and creators by offering intelligent copywriting, AI-powered visual design, and advanced video creation capabilities. Starbox plans to support 180 Degrees Brandcom in its advertising business with this new platform.

articles.title: Enterprises can now run real-time data through Google Cloud's most advanced VMs
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Google Cloud has launched C4A virtual machines (VMs) with Titanium SSDs, custom-designed local disks to enhance storage and performance. These VMs combine low latency and high throughput, suitable for high-performance databases and analytics. They are available in services like Compute Engine and Google Kubernetes Engine and deliver enhanced read/write IOPS and throughput, along with lower latency compared to previous-generation SSDs.

articles.title: How AI is transforming the fashion retail experience in the Middle East
articles.author: Sulafa Alkhunaizi
org: Small and Medium Enterprises General Authority
articles.summary: Taffi, a Riyadh-based AI fashion marketplace, launched Amira, a personal stylist powered by generative AI and machine learning. Amira offers personalized styling recommendations and has shown a 15% sales conversion rate for users who engage with it, leading to a 22-fold increase in sales conversions. The average order value for purchases made through Taffi was also 55% higher.

articles.title: Top Smart Gadgets to Look Forward to in 2025 (Updates)
articles.author: Marty Spargo
articles.summary: Nest is expected to release the Nest Protect 3rd Gen in mid-2025. This device will feature advanced sensors for detecting VOCs and carbon monoxide. Upon detecting a fire, it will automatically shut off the HVAC system.

articles.title: Soup that sucks: Progresso soup drops are your new cold remedy this winter
articles.author: Haley Coomes
articles.summary: Progresso launched a limited-edition product called 'Soup Drops,' soup-flavored hard candies, available exclusively on their website. The product, designed for cold and flu season, aims to deliver flavors of chicken noodle soup in candy form. The 'Soup Drops' were sold out on Thursday following the launch.

articles.title: The Switch 2 trailer really lingers on those updated analog sticks – will the stick drift curse finally end?
articles.author: Issy van der Velde
articles.summary: Nintendo officially revealed the Nintendo Switch 2, highlighting redesigned Joy-Con sticks to address drift issues from the original console. The new console features a bigger screen, a smaller dock, and a sleek black aesthetic with colored accents around the sticks. The revealed trailer focuses on the smooth feel and potential improvement of the Joy-Con sticks.

articles.title: Taco Bell Launches Cheesy New Limited-Time Menu Offering
articles.author: Stacey Ritzen
articles.summary: Taco Bell launched Cheesy Dipping Burritos, a limited-time offering, on January 16th at participating restaurants nationwide. These snack-sized burritos feature a choice of steak or chicken, a blend of cheeses, Avocado Ranch sauce, and a choice of dipping sauce and became available nationwide after a successful test in Detroit.

articles.title: NewTide Development Officially Launches AI Business for Fuels and Convenience Retail Industry with Acquisition
articles.author: New Tide Development
articles.summary: NewTide Development, Inc. is launching an AI software innovation company focused on the energy industry. The company will build solutions tailored for fuels and convenience retail markets.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Release Date and Features: What We Can Expect from the April Reveal
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Nintendo has officially announced the Nintendo Switch 2, set for release in 2025. This next-generation console features a larger screen, magnetic Joy-Con controllers, a U-shaped kickstand, backward compatibility for existing games, and a second USB-C port. Nintendo plans to reveal more details during a Nintendo Direct event on April 2, 2025 and will host hands-on experience events in various cities worldwide.

articles.title: Nintendo's new Switch 2 console will come out in 2025
articles.author: Associated Press
articles.summary: Nintendo showcased a larger version of the Switch in a new promotional video. This new model appears similar to its predecessor but with an increased size.

articles.title: LL Bean unveils massive tent store as flagship undergoes major renovations
articles.author: Bangor Daily News
articles.summary: L.L. Bean launched Camp L.L. Bean, a large tent acting as a full store, in Freeport. This temporary store opened while the company's flagship store is under construction, providing a shopping solution for customers.

articles.title: Iconic soup company and Campbell's rival transforms classic soup recipe into hard candy but you must wait for the ‘drop'
articles.author: Maya Lanzone
articles.summary: Progresso, a brand of General Mills, has launched a new product called Soup Drops. These are soup-flavored hard candies designed to mimic the taste of Progresso's chicken noodle soup and are available in limited edition. The product launch coincided with National Soup Month, and fans can purchase them online.

articles.title: vyšší výkon, větší displej a přepracované ovladače
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Nintendo is introducing the Nintendo Switch 2, retaining the hybrid concept with a sleek design and a larger, potentially OLED, display. Redesigned Joy-Con controllers address ergonomic issues. The new console is expected to have a summer release with enhanced online features and backward compatibility.

articles.title: Phaedon Appoints Ravi Erraguntla as Chief Product Officer
articles.author: PRN
articles.summary: Phaedon has appointed Ravi Erraguntla as its new Chief Product Officer. Erraguntla will lead Phaedon's product strategy, focusing on the development and enhancement of the Tally loyalty platform and the Clary AI-powered customer insights engine. This includes refining Phaedon's offerings for a diverse clientele, from small enterprises to global corporations.

articles.title: Indian film star Saif Ali Khan stabbed by burglar
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Article rewriter tools leverage AI and NLP to reinterpret text, aiding writers in repurposing content while maintaining originality. These tools save time, enhance SEO, and boost productivity by enabling the creation of multiple content versions tailored for different platforms. Dr. Emily Carter, an AI and NLP expert, highlighted the potential of these tools to revolutionize content creation and improve efficiency.

articles.title: LinkedIn Highlights its Advancing Ad Targeting Tools in New Campaign
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: LinkedIn has launched a new promotional campaign to showcase the effectiveness of its ad targeting options, including AI audience reach tools. The campaign highlights how LinkedIn can help connect advertisers with the right audience, avoiding wasted ad spend by leveraging its user base and targeting capabilities based on industry, company, and role.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Release Date, Features, and Global Tour Announced for 2025
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Nintendo has announced the upcoming release of its next-generation gaming console, the Nintendo Switch 2, slated for late 2024 or early 2025. The new console will retain a hybrid design with improved processing power, graphics, a larger screen, and is rumored to be backward compatible. The Switch 2 is expected to enhance the gaming experience with better performance and potentially feature new interactions.

articles.title: LL Bean unveils massive tent store as flagship undergoes major renovations
articles.author: CBS 13
articles.summary: L.L. Bean is launching an in-store eatery featuring a diverse menu and ample seating as part of its flagship store's renovation. They are also creating a new Custom Shop that has expanded monogramming and engraving personalization options.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Will Do for Indies What Steam Did on PC
articles.author: Anthony Franklin II
articles.summary: Nintendo is potentially launching the Switch 2 with enhanced Joy-Cons featuring mouse-like functionality. This innovation aims to attract indie game developers by offering a control scheme that closely mirrors PC gaming, potentially expanding their reach and creating new gaming experiences. The new feature could establish Switch 2 as the go-to console for indie games.

articles.title: Numaish Offers Start-Ups an Opportunity to Shine
articles.author: DC Correspondent
articles.summary: T-Hub and Exhibition Society launched the Innovation Pavilion at the All India Industrial Exhibition (AIIE) 2025 (Numaish) to support startups. The pavilion provides a platform for startups to showcase their products and services, including B2B online services, electric two-wheelers, health solutions, and electronic waste management. Over 30 startups are participating, with stalls offered for free on a rotational basis.

articles.title: From Inventor To IP Advocate: How Jacquelyn De Jesu Is Shaping The Future Of Innovation With Shhhowercap
articles.author: Karin Eldor
articles.summary: Shhhowercap is launching Extended Day Haircare, a new proprietary product line for women who skip daily washes, in 2025. Additionally, they are testing mini Shhhowercaps designed for kids, indicating an expansion of their product offerings.

articles.title: 10 fragrances that smell far more expensive than their high street price tag
articles.author: CHARLOTTE VOSSEN
articles.summary: & Other Stories launched Blank Pages fragrance which is described as a 'second skin' scent. Zara introduced Waterlily Tea Dress, a fragrance created by Jo Malone. Merit Beauty launched its first fragrance named Retrospect, an extrait de parfum.

articles.title: 2024 Genesis GV60 Performance Luxury Electric Wows!
articles.summary: Genesis has launched the GV60 Performance, a high-performance, luxury electric coupé crossover. The GV60 includes features like a 'Boost Button' for increased performance, i-Pedal mode for one-pedal driving, and a 'Drift Mode' for dynamic driving. It also boasts advanced safety features and a fast charging capability, with a base price of $70,745.

articles.title: The Roborock Q5 Max Plus drops to an all-time low of $280
articles.author: Quentyn Kennemer
articles.summary: Roborock is offering the Q5 Max Plus robot vacuum for $279.99. The Q5 Max Plus features dual rubber roller brushes, Lidar navigation with multi-level 3D room mapping, a self-emptying base with a 2.5-liter bin, adjustable 5,500Pa suction power, and voice command support via Google Assistant, Amazon Alexa, and Apple Siri.

articles.title: The Switch 2's bigger screen is just what I wanted
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Nintendo has revealed the Switch 2, a refined version of the original Switch, featuring a larger screen, improved Joy-Cons, an additional USB-C port, and backward compatibility with Switch games.  A new Mario Kart game is the only official game for Switch 2. The console is expected to be more powerful and is slated for release in 2025.

articles.title: Nintendo Announces Launch of Nintendo Switch 2 in 2025
articles.author: Jeremy Newman
articles.summary: Nintendo will release the Nintendo Switch 2 in 2025, featuring both exclusive games and support for original Nintendo Switch games. A special broadcast is planned for April 2, 2025 to showcase the new console. Nintendo also plans a global series of Nintendo Switch 2 Experience events for fans.

articles.title: Shoppers swear by this 'safe and effective' anti-slip bath mat, down to just $14
articles.author: Moriba Cummings
articles.summary: MontVoo introduces the Nonslip Bathtub Mat featuring a loofah-like texture and lattice pattern for enhanced grip and drainage. User reviews highlight its non-slip properties, comfort, and suitability for seniors and those recovering from injuries.

articles.title: I'd Rather Be Sick Than Eat Progresso Soup Drops Ever Again
articles.author: Dennis Lee
articles.summary: Progresso launched a new product called "Soup Drops", a suckable form of chicken noodle soup in cough drop format, on January 16th. These limited-edition Soup Drops are available for $2.49 each plus shipping on progressosoupdrops.com, with new batches released every Thursday until the end of January. The packaging resembles a miniature can of soup and the lozenges contain ingredients like isomalt, chicken meat powder, and flavor enhancers.

articles.title: TRAEGER GRILLS CELEBRATES 40 YEARS OF INNOVATION WITH THE ALL-NEW WOODRIDGE PELLET GRILL SERIES
articles.author: HJ News
articles.summary: The All-New Woodridge® Series introduces cutting-edge technology, elevated flavor, and unmatched versatility. It is designed to be accessible with approachable price points.

articles.title: Top beard washes to maintain cleanliness and style
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: Professor Fuzzworthy's Beard Shampoo is highlighted as a top pick due to its natural ingredients and anti-itch properties. Viking Revolution Beard Wash and Beard Conditioning Set is mentioned as a budget-friendly option for cleaning and hydrating beard hair. OneDTQ Medicine Man's Anti-Itch Beard Wash is also featured, emphasizing its natural and organic composition designed to combat itch and irritation during beard growth.

articles.title: Call Your Mother ‘Jew-ish' deli opens kiosk in Crystal City
articles.author: Katie Taranto
articles.summary: Call Your Mother, a D.C.-born deli, has launched a new location in Crystal City, Virginia. The new kiosk offers its signature bagel sandwiches, bodega-style egg sandwiches, and deli treats, including a variety of cream cheeses and schmears.

articles.title: 'Why the Nintendo Switch 2's Simplicity is Key for Success.'
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Nintendo has a history of introducing innovative products, like the Game Boy and the Switch. Nintendo took risks with dual-screened handheld consoles and motion-controlled consoles. Nintendo launched the Switch after the Wii U.

articles.title: Fmcg innovation is worse than ever. Here's why
articles.author: David Sables
articles.summary: Moth successfully launched a range of bar-strength, bar-quality classic cocktails in a can, entering the RTD category as an independent brand. Waitrose was the first to list it and, once proven and financed, it expanded to major grocery multiples. Moth's innovation created a premium canned cocktail segment by trading up shoppers to a higher price point.

articles.title: NETdepot Debuts Next-Generation Cloud GPU Platform Featuring the NVIDIA L40S, Delivering Uncompromised Performance for AI Workloads
articles.author: Net Depot
articles.summary: NETdepot launched its Cloud GPU platform, featuring the NVIDIA L40S. The new solution delivers bare-metal GPU performance with enterprise-grade security. This empowers organizations to accelerate AI, machine learning, and high-performance computing initiatives.

articles.title: Watching video game history happen again with the Nintendo Switch 2
articles.author: Dean Takahashi
articles.summary: Nintendo has officially revealed the name of its new console as Nintendo Switch 2. The reveal was made through a Nintendo Direct video. The original Nintendo Switch launch included games like 1-2-Switch and The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.

articles.title: Luma AI releases Ray2 generative video model with 'fast, natural' motion and better physics
articles.author: Carl Franzen
articles.summary: Luma AI has launched Ray2, a new video AI generation model available through its Dream Machine platform and mobile apps. This model is trained with 10 times more compute than Ray1. Luma also recently updated its Dream Machine platform to include new still image generation, brainstorming boards, and an iOS app.

articles.title: MiniMax unveils its own open-source LLM with industry-leading 4M token context
articles.author: Carl Franzen
articles.summary: MiniMax has launched the MiniMax-01 series, a new family of models designed for ultra-long contexts and enhanced AI agent development. The series includes MiniMax-Text-01, a large language model with a 4 million token context window, and MiniMax-VL-01, a visual multimodal model. The models are now available for download on Hugging Face and Github.

articles.title: Shoppers rave about Ninja's £3.75 non-stick frying pan deal that's 'changing the kitchen game'
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Ninja is promoting its Zerostick Essentials 20cm Frying Pan, highlighting its non-stick properties, durability, and ease of cleaning. The frying pan has received mostly positive reviews, with many customers praising its non-stick performance.  New TopCashback members can purchase the pan for £3.75 after discounts.

articles.title: Shoppers rave about Ninja's £3.75 non-stick frying pan deal that's 'game-changing'
articles.author: Shawna Healey
articles.summary: Ninja is offering its Zerostick Essentials 20cm Frying Pan for a significantly reduced price through a winter sale and a TopCashback promotion. Customers are highly satisfied with its non-stick properties, ease of cleaning, and versatility for cooking various foods, with some reviewers highlighting its superior performance compared to other non-stick pans.

articles.title: How to Transition from Smoking to Vaping: A Step-by-Step Guide?
articles.author: Bill Oates
articles.summary: The article introduces vaping as an alternative to traditional cigarettes, highlighting 'zen master vape' as a suitable vaping device. It discusses selecting the right vaping device and e-liquids with appropriate nicotine strength and flavor to aid smokers in transitioning. The article aims to provide smokers with a satisfying and healthier alternative through vaping.

articles.title: What to know about the new Nintendo Switch 2
articles.author: Harry Rabinowitz
articles.summary: Nintendo has revealed the Nintendo Switch 2, the successor to the original Nintendo Switch, in a first-look trailer. The Switch 2 features a larger screen and controllers, a redesigned dock, and backward compatibility with physical and digital Nintendo Switch games. The new console is expected to launch in 2025.

articles.title: Nintendo reveals Switch 2 console in teaser trailer
articles.author: Usatoday
articles.summary: Nintendo teased the Switch successor on Thursday. The company released a teaser trailer offering a first look at the new console, the Switch 2. The Switch 2 appears to be larger than the original device.

articles.title: Nintendo confirms Switch 2 console will have the feature gamers are 'begging' for
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch 2 will support backwards compatibility for many original Nintendo Switch games, including physical and digital titles purchased on the eShop. Certain games, especially those utilizing unique hardware like Labo or Ring Fit, may not be fully compatible. Further details on compatibility will be revealed on April 4, 2025.

articles.title: Starbucks Reverses Its Open-Door Policy
articles.author: Seattle Medium
articles.summary: Starbucks is implementing a new policy requiring customers to make a purchase to use the restrooms or hang out in the store. This represents a change in service accessibility for customers.

articles.title: Agilent Introduces the IDP 35 and IDP 45 Dry Scroll Pumps (Agilent Technologies Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Agilent Technologies Inc. announced the launch of the Agilent IDP-35 and IDP-45 dry scroll pumps. These pumps are designed to provide quiet, efficient, oil-free vacuum solutions. They solidify Agilent's position in laboratory instrumentation, research, cryogenics, and industrial processes.

articles.title: DJI launches Flip, a compact lightweight drone that can fly up to 30 minutes
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: DJI has launched the DJI Flip, a lightweight foldable drone aimed at vloggers. This drone features a 48MP CMOS sensor capable of recording 4K HDR videos and offers intelligent shooting modes with a flight time of 30 minutes. The DJI Flip is selling for $439 and includes a basic RC-N3 joystick controller.

articles.title: Doritos fans go crazy over ‘spicy' new flavor for $3 at Walmart – shoppers say it's ‘weird' but ‘woke up my tastebuds'
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Doritos has released a new flavor, Golden Sriracha, described as a tangy and sweet chip with a peppery, smoky spice reminiscent of Spicy Sweet Chili but with more kick. The new flavor is currently available at Walmart, and early reviews indicate a generally positive reception, with some comparing it favorably to the existing Spicy Sweet Chili flavor.

articles.title: Zoom unveils new Zoom Team Chat enhancements with AI Companion for streamlined collaboration and communication
articles.summary: Zoom is launching a redesigned Team Chat sidebar with AI enhancements. This update allows users to customize their workspace by reordering and pinning tabs, tailoring notifications, and using AI Companion. The goal is to improve user workflow, collaboration, and productivity within the Zoom Workplace platform.

articles.title: Starbox Unveils StarboxAI-IntelliContentCreate, an AI-Powered Content Creation Platform, to Support 180 Degrees Brandcom in its Advertising Business
articles.summary: Starbox launches StarboxAI-IntelliContentCreate. The platform is designed to support 180 Degrees Brandcom by providing AI-driven insights and automation for personalized advertising campaigns. This launch aims to foster innovative advertising through data management and effective marketing.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers issued urgent three-word instructions over £2 household staple
articles.author: James Rodger
articles.summary: Aldi has launched new Filled Mini Eggs with Jaffa, Nutoka, and Caramelised biscuit flavors for Easter. They have also introduced Ready, Set...Cook! Mini Chocolate Egg Cookie Dough, priced at £1.79 for 250g, which can be baked in 12 minutes. Both product lines are now available in Aldi stores.

articles.title: The 6 Best AI Humanizer Tools for Bypassing Detection
articles.summary: Monica AI Humanizer is introduced as a standout tool with proven AI detection bypass capabilities and a user-friendly interface. The product consistently produces text that bypasses detection while maintaining original meaning and readability. The author recommends Monica AI's Humanizer as a valuable asset for refining and enhancing AI-generated content, highlighting its transparency, performance, and user-friendly design.

articles.title: Nintendo says Switch 2 release this year, more details in April
articles.author: Sam Nussey
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch the Switch 2 console, the successor to the Switch, later this year. Existing Switch software will be usable on the new device, although some games may not be fully compatible. More details, including pricing, will be provided at a Nintendo Direct event on April 2.

articles.title: Lovense Osci 3 Review: A Vibrator That Warms Up
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: A vibrator features dual motors and a warming function to mimic body temperature, offering users a more natural sensation.

articles.title: 'Soup you can suck on': Progresso introduces new chicken noodle soup-flavored hard candy
articles.author: Gabe Hauari
articles.summary: Progresso is launching Soup Drops, a chicken noodle soup-flavored hard candy. The limited-time release coincides with cold and flu season and is available exclusively online starting January 16th. Each order includes a can of Progresso Traditional Chicken Noodle Soup for $2.49 plus shipping.

articles.title: FSI ANNOUNCES NEW CONTRACT FOR FOOD GRADE MANUFACTURING
articles.author: Inc
articles.summary: Flexible Solutions International, Inc. has signed a five-year contract with a U.S. based company to manufacture food grade products on a non-exclusive basis, estimating annual revenue between $15 million and $30 million or more. Production is expected to begin in approximately six months after FSI expands its clean room space and installs necessary equipment.

articles.title: Soup You Can Suck On: Introducing Progresso Soup Drops, the Ultimate Cold and Flu Season Comfort
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: General Mills, under its Progresso brand, is launching a limited-edition product called 'Soup Drops,' a hard candy version of their Chicken Noodle Soup. These soup drops will be available exclusively on ProgressoSoupDrops.com starting January 16th, and will be sold with a can of Progresso Traditional Chicken Noodle Soup.

articles.title: Progresso Chicken Noodle Soup Is Now Available in Hard Candy Form — and We Tried It
articles.author: Erin Clements
articles.summary: Progresso is launching a limited-edition product called "Progresso Soup Drops," a hard candy version of their Traditional Chicken Noodle Soup. These individually wrapped candies, priced at $2.49 plus shipping, are available at ProgressoSoupDrops.com every Thursday in January, starting January 16th, and come with a can of the original soup.

articles.title: Watching video game history happen again with the Nintendo Switch 2
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Nintendo announced the Nintendo Switch 2 via a Nintendo Direct video. The announcement, released at 5 a.m. Pacific time, confirmed the official name of the new console following leaks and high anticipation.

articles.title: The Nintendo Switch 2 Has Been Revealed: More Info April 2
articles.author: Scott Stein
articles.summary: Nintendo has announced the Switch 2, a follow-up to the original Nintendo Switch, with improved graphics, controllers, and performance. The company plans hands-on experiences in select cities in April, hinting at a potential launch in May or later.

articles.title: Everyone In Retail Is Talking About This Technology Right Now
articles.author: Richard Kestenbaum
articles.summary: Target partnered with Zebra Technologies, Qualcomm Technologies and Google Cloud to develop an AI Agent to assist employees with tasks like inventory management and order placement. Profitmind offers an AI Agent that analyzes retailer data and suggests strategic tactics, resulting in significant revenue and profit increases for clients like Home Depot and Crocs. Aptos' Revionics subsidiary provides AI agents to optimize pricing strategies, allowing retailers to dynamically adjust prices based on competitor data and market conditions.

articles.title: Amazon to axe major Prime membership perk this month
articles.author: Courtney Eales
articles.summary: Amazon is phasing out its 'Try Before You Buy' service for Prime members on January 31. This decision is due to the limited scalability of the service and the increased use of new AI-powered features like virtual try-on and personalized size recommendations. These AI features serve as a replacement by enabling customers to find the right fit.

articles.title: Elon Musk's xAI launches web version of Grok chatbot and its Free
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: xAI has launched a web version of its Grok AI chatbot, making it accessible without an X account. This beta version at Grok.com offers features similar to the iOS app, including real-time information gathering and image generation. The launch expands Grok's accessibility, catering to users who prefer a dedicated website experience.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland fans rushing to buy new Dyson hair dryer dupe in middle aisle – and it's €270 cheaper
articles.author: Isabela Boechat
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland is launching a new Ionic Hair Dryer, retailing for €49.99, as a dupe for the Dyson Supersonic. Additionally, they are introducing a dual-function hair styling brush, priced at €19.99, similar to the Revlon One Step Volumiser. Both products will be available in stores from January 20th to 22nd.

articles.title: 2025 will be the year the true AI assistant becomes a reality for Apple, Google, Samsung, and OpenAI – and it's going to happen fast
articles.author: Graham Barlow
articles.summary: Samsung is set to upgrade its AI offering at the Galaxy Unpacked event, potentially evolving Bixby into a true AI virtual assistant. Apple is planning an Apple Intelligence update for Siri, enhancing its on-screen awareness and personal context knowledge. Google's Gemini AI and Jarvis AI are also being introduced, while Microsoft is focusing on Microsoft Copilot 365 AI and Amazon plans to transform Alexa's capabilities.

articles.title: The New BMW M5 Needs to Decide If It's for Business or Pleasure
articles.author: Will Sabel Courtney
articles.summary: BMW launched the new M5 (G90 sedan and G99 station wagon/M5 Touring) with a plug-in hybrid powertrain featuring a 4.4-liter twin-turbo V-8 engine and electric motor, delivering a combined output of 717 horsepower. The M5's battery pack enables it to travel 25 miles on electricity alone. Compared to its predecessor, this new model introduces gasoline and electric propulsion for the first time.

articles.title: Demandbase Expands Integration with Gong to Streamline Sales and Marketing Workflows
articles.author: Demandbase
articles.summary: Demandbase announced new integrations with Gong, the revenue AI company. This integration builds on their initial collaboration, making contact, intent, and engagement data accessible within both platforms. It allows revenue teams to carry out account-based sales engagement activities from a single pane of glass leveraging intent and engagement data from Demandbase One™and customer interaction data from Gong.

articles.title: Nvidia Backs Sahabat-AI Development in Indonesia, Says GoTo CEO Patrick Walujo
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Indosat and Nvidia are introducing Sahabat-AI, an AI engine designed for the Indonesian market. This AI solution, built on Nvidia's platform, understands Indonesian and regional languages and reflects the nation's cultural nuances. Sahabat-AI features large language models and plans to expand its capabilities and reach in various sectors, driving Indonesia's digital transformation.

articles.title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 Series Launch in Indonesia: AI-Powered Camera & 4 Variants
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Xiaomi is launching the Redmi Note 14 Series on January 24, 2025, featuring a modern design, AI-powered camera technology, and enhanced performance. The series includes Redmi Note 14, Redmi Note 14 5G, Redmi Note 14 Pro 5G, and Redmi Note 14 Pro+ 5G models, targeting young, tech-savvy individuals with a focus on innovation and user-centric design in Indonesia.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers 'shocked' as popular perk for Prime members axed
articles.author: Miranda Pell
articles.summary: Amazon is phasing out its 'Try Before You Buy' service for Prime members at the end of January 2025. This decision is attributed to the increasing adoption of AI-powered virtual try-on features and personalized size recommendations. The 'Try Before You Buy' scheme allowed customers to try clothing and accessories before committing to a purchase, but Amazon believes the new AI features offer a better solution.

articles.title: HMD Fusion Review: Affordable smartphone with a distinctive edge
articles.author: Mansi Taneja
articles.summary: HMD has launched the HMD Fusion, a 5G smartphone with a modular design and detachable 'Smart Outfits,' targeted towards gaming enthusiasts. The Fusion features a 108MP dual camera, Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor, and a user-replaceable battery, priced at ₹17,999. Users can also download CAD files from HMD's website to create their own smart outfits.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch OLED prices are dropping fast as new console expected to drop
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch 2, the gaming giant's newest console, is anticipated for announcement soon. The new console might feature a bigger screen, bigger battery, and better internal hardware, potentially allowing for games like Final Fantasy VII Rebirth. The launch could be anytime from now up until March 2025.

articles.title: Glow Up: Best Body Lotions to Get in the Myntra Right to Fashion Sale
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Nivea introduces Cocoa Nourish Body Lotion with 48-hour hydration and cocoa butter. Vaseline promotes Intensive Care Deep Moisture Body Lotion for dry skin with glycerin and Vaseline Jelly. Ponds launches Hydra Miracle Body Gel Lotion with hyaluronic acid. GROOVY offers SPF15+ Skin Lighten & Brightening Body Lotion, and Plum presents BodyLovin' Vanilla Caramello Body Lotion with cocoa butter.

articles.title: I tried the new Aldi mini easter eggs -with famous dupe fillings of Nutella, Jaffa Cake and Lotus Biscoff
articles.author: Senior Reporter
articles.summary: Aldi introduced a new range of mini eggs under the Dairy Fine brand, featuring three varieties: Caramelised Biscuit (Lotus Biscoff inspired), Jaffa (Jaffa Cake style branding), and Nutoka (Nutella inspired). These mini eggs are priced at £1.99 for 150g.

articles.title: The dream of a phone that doubles as a laptop is so close I can taste it
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite processor demonstrates performance comparable to low-end laptop CPUs. Google's Pixel 8 series introduces DisplayPort Alt Mode via USB-C. Furthermore, some phone manufacturers offer platforms to shift their operating systems into desktop mode for their devices, with Samsung DeX being a prominent example.

articles.title: Botika raises $8M to change fashion photography with AI-generated fashion models
articles.summary: Botika has launched a mobile app powered by its AI-generated model platform, designed for fashion brands to create and edit high-quality, on-model product photos directly from their phones. This new product enables brands to streamline image production, accelerate time-to-market, reduce costs, and improve sales by providing a virtual AI-powered studio in their hands. The app also includes new support for flat lays and packshots for mobile users on e-commerce platforms.

articles.title: SkinGPT: AI Revolution in Personalized Skincare Shopping
articles.author: PRN
articles.summary: Haut.AI has launched SkinGPT, a generative AI technology for virtual skincare try-ons, designed for beauty brands to allow consumers to visualize the effects of products. Alongside SkinGPT, Haut.AI introduced Generative.Skin, an interactive platform where users can explore the impact of various skincare ingredients through hyper-realistic visualizations.

articles.title: LG Display unveils new 4th-gen OLED panel for AI TVs
articles.author: 김보람
articles.summary: LG Display introduced its fourth-generation OLED panel designed for AI TVs. The new OLED panel has improved image quality, higher brightness of 4,000 nits, and enhanced energy efficiency of 20 percent compared to the previous generation. The panel also minimizes reflected light and reduces harmful blue light.

articles.title: Ninja fans 'hit the jackpot' with £3.75 kitchen buy that has them 'binning' their pans
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Ninja is offering the Zerostick Essentials 20cm Frying Pan, promoted for its non-stick properties and versatility. The pan, usually priced at £29.99, is currently available for a reduced price of £20.09 with further discounts available through TopCashback. Customer reviews highlight its non-stick performance, ease of cleaning, and suitability for various cooking tasks.

articles.title: Should You Use a Toner, Essence, or Both?
articles.author: Odunmorayo Ayobami
articles.summary: Cosrx introduced the Full Fit Propolis Synergy Toner containing black bee propolis extract and honey, while Dear Klairs offers the Supple Preparation Facial Toner with Beta-Glucan and Hyaluronic Acid. Missha launched the Time Revolution The First Essence 5X featuring Fermented Yeast Extract, and Dr. Ceuracle provides the Vegan Kombucha Tea Essence packed with probiotics and antioxidants. Pyunkang Yul offers Facial Essence Toner with 91% Milk Vetch Root Extract.

articles.title: After the honeymoon: Is the Toyota Yaris Cross still any good?
articles.summary: The Toyota Yaris Cross hybrid, launched over a year ago, is being reviewed. The review assesses its comfort, fuel efficiency, and features such as adaptive cruise control and 360-degree cameras. It competes with the Corolla Cross.

articles.title: Reviewers Don't Regret Buying These 40 Beauty Products — Except For Wishing They'd Bought ‘Em Sooner
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article highlights numerous beauty and personal care products, recently discovered and raved about by reviewers. Products range from skincare like CeraVe eye cream and Cosrx Snail Mucin, to haircare like Elizavecca Hair Treatment and Revlon's One-Step Hair Dryer, as well as makeup items like Essence's Lash Princess mascara. These products are celebrated for their effectiveness, affordability, and positive impact on users' beauty routines.

articles.title: Poco X7 goes on sale for Rs 21,999: Top 4 reasons to buy, 1 to skip
articles.summary: Poco launched the Poco X7, priced from Rs 21,999, featuring a durable build with IP69 rating and Gorilla Glass Victus 2 protection. The phone has a 6.67-inch AMOLED display with 1.5K resolution, Dolby Vision, HDR10, and stereo speakers, and is powered by a 5,500mAh battery with 45W charging.

articles.title: Oh Dear! Perfume Makes Luxury Scents Affordable with Bea Borres
articles.summary: Oh Dear! Perfume has launched its debut collection, 'The First Bloom,' featuring three unique fragrances: Harmony Breeze, Sweet Solace, and Golden Blossom. The brand aims to offer high-quality, affordable scents, crafted from the finest ingredients, making luxury accessible to everyone.

articles.title: MAGGI Celebrates Kitchen Heroes With CNY Campaign And Prize Giveaways
articles.author: Fernando Fong
articles.summary: MAGGI has launched a festive campaign featuring an e-Ang Pao contest worth RM300,000 and premium cookware sets. The 'Peraduan Keriangan Perayaan dari Hati ke Hidangan' contest requires a minimum purchase of RM10 worth of MAGGI products. The campaign also features modernized recipes for traditional dishes.

articles.title: This Stick Vacuum Cleans Just as Well as a Dyson, According to Walmart Shoppers — and It's 73% Off
articles.author: Megan Schaltegger
articles.summary: The Moosoo Cordless Stick Vacuum, available at Walmart, is presented as a budget-friendly alternative to Dyson vacuums. It features a lightweight design, up to 35 minutes of battery life, and powerful suction for various flooring types. Currently, it is on sale for $80.

articles.title: Delhivery launches 2-hour 'rapid commerce' delivery service amid growing craze for quick commerce
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Delhivery has launched 'Rapid Commerce,' a sub-2-hour delivery service designed for D2C brands, retailers, and e-commerce platforms. The service, which has already processed over 300 orders daily in Bengaluru, leverages a network of shared in-city Rapid Stores for faster order fulfillment, and the company plans to expand the service to other major metropolitan cities.

articles.title: Xiaomi to Launch Redmi Note 14 Series in Indonesia on January 24, 2025
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Xiaomi Indonesia is launching its Redmi Note 14 series on January 24, 2025, targeting young Indonesians. The series includes Redmi Note 14, Redmi Note 14 5G, Redmi Note 14 Pro 5G, and Redmi Note 14 Pro+ 5G variants, featuring advanced camera systems with AI technology and AI-driven editing capabilities.

articles.title: Business grows from Dundas garage to Northfield laundromat
articles.author: Colton Kemp
articles.summary: Luke LaCroix launched Washed Again in April 2023, initially offering pickup and delivery laundry services. Following early commercial success, Washed Again expanded by acquiring a laundromat, now called Washed Again Laundry Center, equipped with 32 dryers and 27 washers of various sizes. Washed Again provides a clean and welcoming environment with calming music.

articles.title: Pump and Dispenser Market to Reach USD 14.8 Billion by 2035 with a 4.3% CAGR: Driven by Innovation and Demand for Hygiene Solutions
articles.author: Future Market Insights Global
articles.summary: Richmond launched its Dawn Airless Range of mono-material PE airless bottles and pumps in December 2024. Silgan Holdings Inc. introduced ReVive™ 1.4cc, a fully recyclable dispenser with an all-plastic refill system, in September 2024.

articles.title: Trump Inauguration Tee Review: Comfort, Style, and Patriotism in One Shirt
articles.summary: The "Trump Inauguration Tee," made from 100% pre-shrunk cotton, is being offered for free, with customers only paying a $9.95 shipping fee. Available in sizes S to 5XL, it features a minimalist design expressing support for Donald Trump and comes with a 60-day money-back guarantee. This limited edition tee also includes a 14-day free trial for unlimited courses on self-reliance.

articles.title: National Startup Day 2025: Union minister Piyush Goyal reflects on nine years of ‘Startup India'
articles.author: ETtech
articles.summary: The Indian government launched the Bharat Startup Knowledge Access Registry (BHASKAR) in 2024. BHASKAR serves as a digital platform to unify the startup ecosystem and expand the startup footprint. Over 4.6 lakh registrations were made on the platform since its launch.

articles.title: UAE: Samsung fans can now preorder the new Galaxy S25
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 smartphone series on January 22 at the Galaxy Unpacked event. The Galaxy S25 features a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, up to 16 GB of RAM, and a 200MP primary camera. UAE users can now preorder the device and receive exclusive offers and deals, including a Dh200 gift card.

articles.title: The Astropad Bookcase turns your iPhone into an e-reader
articles.author: Christine Romero-Chan
articles.summary: Astropad has introduced the Bookcase, a magnetic accessory that attaches to smartphones via MagSafe, effectively turning them into e-reader-like devices with handles similar to a paperback book. The Bookcase is compatible with iPhones (naked or with MagSafe cases) and aims to provide a reading experience similar to a Kindle, though without an e-ink display.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra to beat iPhone 16 Pro Max with BIG mobile AI features: Here's what's coming
articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy S25 series, emphasizing new AI capabilities, branding it a 'True AI Companion.' The Galaxy S25 Ultra will feature enhanced Sketch to Image capabilities in its drawing assist feature. Furthermore, the Galaxy Notes app is expected to receive AI-driven upgrades, along with potential hardware enhancements like a more powerful Snapdragon processor.

articles.title: Argos shoppers race to buy £4 straighteners normally worth £70 in flash deal
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: A customer review indicates satisfaction with GHD straighteners, stating their performance is comparable to previously owned straighteners. This suggests existing customer recognition of a GHD product.

articles.title: Amazon axes popular perk for Prime members which shoppers 'used all the time'
articles.author: James Rodger
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its 'Try Before You Buy' service on January 31. The service allowed Prime members to try on select clothing items, shoes, and accessories at home before purchase. Amazon is phasing out the 'Try Before You Buy' option due to the scaling to a limited number of items and customers increasingly using new AI-powered features like virtual try-on, personalized size recommendations, review highlights, and improved size charts.

articles.title: Deliveroo sees orders and spending grow after expanding shopping ranges
articles.author: Anna Wise
articles.summary: A delivery firm is expanding the selection of products available on its platform. This aims to bring more of the neighborhood's offerings to consumers' doors through the platform.

articles.title: Dyson Versus Shark Vacuum Cleaners: Which Brand Performs the Best? (Corded & Cordless)
articles.author: Marisa Hillman
articles.summary: Dyson launched the first bagless vacuum in 1991 and has been innovating since, with recent additions like the Gen5detect Absolute, the most powerful cordless vacuum. Shark took the US market by storm in 2007 and continues to release new models like the Shark Stratos Cordless with a folding wand, aiming for lighter, more maneuverable vacuums. The article tests and compares several models from both brands, providing insights into their performance and features.

articles.title: Revolutionizing Cooking: The Ultimate Guide to Digital Air Fryers
articles.author: Nagpur News
articles.summary: Glen Appliances introduces their digital air fryers, combining style, functionality, and durability. These air fryers offer innovative features and unmatched performance for healthier and smarter cooking. By investing in a Glen digital air fryer, customers embrace a lifestyle upgrade.

articles.title: Temu Turns One in South Africa: Survey Reveals Rising Popularity Among Shoppers
articles.author: Matric Results
articles.summary: Temu, an e-commerce platform, has gained popularity in South Africa for its affordable and quality offerings. A consumer showcased a kitchen sink purchased on Temu featuring a pulldown spray-head faucet, multifunctional wash basin, and digital temperature display. Temu provides a wide selection of merchandise at competitive prices including electronics and appliances, home decor and furnishings, and kitchenware.

articles.title: IBM and L'Oréal to Build First AI Model to Advance the Creation of Sustainable Cosmetics
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: IBM and L'Oréal are collaborating to build a custom AI foundation model to uncover new insights in cosmetic formulation data and facilitate the use of sustainable raw materials. This AI model will accelerate the formulation of new products, reformulation of existing cosmetics, and optimization for scale-up production for L'Oréal's researchers.

articles.title: POCO X7 Pro now available for Rs 24,999 on Flipkart
articles.author: DC Correspondent
articles.summary: POCO launched the POCO X7 Pro, now available on Flipkart starting at Rs 24,999, with launch discounts and bank/exchange offers. The X7 Pro features a 6550mAh battery, 90W HyperCharge, MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Ultra chipset, and a 6.67-inch AMOLED display.

articles.title: Avast Expands Identity Protection Solution to Help Tackle Rise in Scam and Identity Theft
articles.author: Gen Digital Inc
articles.summary: Avast has expanded the availability of Avast Secure Identity, its identity protection solution, to 15 new countries outside the US. This expansion aims to protect users from escalating scam and identity theft risks.

articles.title: Introducing Lee® X: An Innovative Platform that Redefines Men's Apparel
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Lee, an American brand, is launching Lee X. Lee X is a product platform incorporating fabric technology and modern design.

articles.title: Glow Up: Best Body Lotions to Get in the Myntra Right to Fashion Sale
articles.summary: Several new body lotions are being introduced. Cocoa Nourish Body Lotion provides 48-hour hydration, Vaseline Intensive Care Deep Moisture targets dry skin, Ponds Hydra Miracle Body Gel Lotion offers lightweight hydration, GROOVY Skin Lightening Body Lotion provides SPF protection and skin brightening, and Plum's BodyLovin' Lotion offers a vanilla and caramel-scented experience enriched with cocoa butter.

articles.title: Swiggy: Eyeing The Gravy Train
articles.summary: Swiggy has expanded its service offerings beyond traditional food delivery. It now includes Dineout for restaurant reservations, SteppinOut for event bookings, Genie for pick-up and drop-off services, and Minis, a software as a service platform. Additionally, Swiggy has segmented food delivery into sub-categories like Bolt for 10-minute delivery, Café for snacks and beverages, Daily for homestyle meals, and Snacc for quick meals and snacks.

articles.title: Review: Technics AZ100 Earbuds easily beat the likes of Sony and Bose
articles.author: Timothy Beck Werth
articles.summary: Technics, a Panasonic brand, launched the EAH-AZ100 wireless earbuds at CES 2025. These earbuds aim to deliver high-fidelity, reference-class music quality and boast features like a 10mm speaker driver, adaptive active noise cancellation, IPX4 water resistance, and up to 28 hours of battery life with the charging case.

articles.title: LG U+ announced on the 16th that it has changed difficult communication terms and phrases into expre..
articles.author: Igaram
articles.summary: LG U+ is refining 20,000 telecommunication terms into customer-friendly language and has developed a 'customer language converter' using AI to simplify guide phrases. They plan to upgrade this service by customizing phrases based on customer demographics and introducing AI to analyze information delivery methods via messages, pop-ups, and chatbots.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 to Launch on Jan 22: What to Expect
articles.author: Tech Moran
articles.summary: Samsung will unveil its new flagship device, the Samsung Galaxy S25, on January 22, 2025. This launch follows the S24 series and is anticipated to deliver cutting-edge features and improvements.

articles.title: The Honor Magic 7 Pro has arrived, bringing with it a potent mix of both hardware and AI
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Honor has officially launched its new flagship smartphone, the Magic 7 Pro, in Europe. The Magic 7 Pro is described as Honor's latest slab-style flagship smartphone.

articles.title: First look inside Newcastle pancake café Fluffy Fluffy ahead of opening day
articles.author: Barbara Hodgson
articles.summary: Fluffy Fluffy, a Canadian-born company, is launching its new dessert café in Newcastle, offering its famous Japanese-style soufflé pancakes. The opening on January 18 will feature free lemonade and half-price pancakes, as well as a chance to win free pancakes for a year. The menu includes soufflé pancakes with various toppings, savoury croffles, and drinks like matcha espresso and pistachio latte.

articles.title: JCI Trading Expands Frozen Poultry Products to Meet Growing Market Demand
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: JCI Trading LLC has expanded its frozen poultry product line. The enhanced selection includes frozen chicken feet, gizzards, breasts, and drumsticks, complementing existing offerings.

articles.title: LG Display unveils new 4th-gen OLED panel for AI TVs
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: LG Display unveiled its new fourth-generation OLED technology on Thursday. The company is introducing an updated version of its display technology.

articles.title: Stanley has a new tumbler rival called HydroJug, and you're going to want to ‘check' out its 20% off sales
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: HydroJug is having a 'Birthday Sale' on January 17, offering discounts on its reusable water bottles. The sale includes the HydroJug Pro and Sleeve models. The HydroJug is available in eight colors, including Pink Sand, Black, Navy and White.

articles.title: Stanley has a new tumbler rival called HydroJug, and you're going to want to ‘check' out its 20% off sales
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: HydroJug is having a 'Birthday Sale' with discounts up to 50% on select items including Traveler Tumblers, Sport Bottles, and Jugs. The sale includes the limited-edition Checkers and recently restocked Candy Coated color options. The HydroJug Sport Jug, which holds 64-ounces and keeps drinks cold for 24 hours, is also on sale.

articles.title: Geely Auto drives into Australian market with Havas Media
articles.author: Nathan Jolly
articles.summary: Geely Auto has partnered with Havas Media for its first consumer engagement campaign in Australia to support pre-launch activities for the upcoming Geely EX5. The campaign focuses on showcasing Geely's innovation and technology to Australian consumers and building brand awareness prior to the vehicle's official launch.

articles.title: Luma AI releases Ray2 generative video model with ‘fast, natural' motion and better physics
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Luma AI has launched Ray2, its newest video AI generation model, accessible through the Dream Machine platform. Ray2 offers fast, coherent motion and was trained with 10 times more compute than its predecessor, Ray1. The model, currently limited to text-to-video, can generate videos in seconds, with Luma planning to add image-to-video, video-to-video, and editing capabilities in the future.

articles.title: Realme 14 Pro+ 5G and Realme 14 Pro 5G launched in India: Price, features, availability
articles.author: The Hindu
articles.summary: Realme is introducing the Realme 14 Pro series 5G smartphones. The smartphones feature cold-sensitive color-changing technology.

articles.title: HONOR Launches Magic7 Pro in MEA: Empowering the Future with AI and Seamless Mobile Innovation
articles.author: Eye
articles.summary: HONOR launched the HONOR Magic7 Pro in Dubai, UAE. The HONOR Magic7 Pro features AI capabilities for photography, display quality, and hardware.

articles.title: Innovative Eyewear Announces Lucyd Armor™ Safety Certification for Canada
articles.author: Victoria Advocate
articles.summary: Innovative Eyewear, Inc. is launching a new service, although the specific details of this service are not provided in this excerpt.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Release Date and Features: What We Can Expect from the April Reveal
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch the Nintendo Switch 2 in 2025. The next-generation console will build on the success of the original Nintendo Switch. It will include significant upgrades and new features.

articles.title: Nintendo officially reveals the Nintendo Switch 2, its next hybrid console
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Nintendo unveiled the Nintendo Switch 2 console. This marks the first look at the new product from the company.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 officially unveiled in first look trailer
articles.author: NME
articles.summary: Nintendo unveiled the Switch 2 with a teaser trailer, revealing a larger, more powerful console. The company also acknowledged that some existing Nintendo Switch games may not be fully compatible with the new console.

articles.title: Amazon has the 4x sold-out Ninja SLUSHi in stock and it'll ship next week
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Ninja SLUSHi is now available for purchase after facing prior 'out of stock' issues. Consumers can now obtain the product, suggesting improved availability.

articles.title: Motorola just announced a new Moto G phone with a surprising spec
articles.author: Business Ghana
articles.summary: Motorola has introduced two new budget-friendly Moto G phones: the Moto G Power 2025 and the Moto G 2025. The Moto G Power 2025 stands out by offering premium specifications at an affordable price.

articles.title: DHL Launches Comprehensive Logistics Facility at Muscat International Airport in Oman
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: DHL Express inaugurated a cutting-edge logistics facility. This new facility represents an expansion of DHL's service offerings.

articles.title: Nintendo's new Switch 2 console will come out in 2025
articles.author: The Call
articles.summary: Nintendo revealed its newest console, the Nintendo Switch 2. The Switch 2 is the successor to the original Nintendo Switch.

articles.title: Yes, the Nintendo Switch 2 is really called that, but I was hoping for a ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Nintendo unveiled the Nintendo Switch 2. The new product has been officially launched.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 pre-orders aren't live yet, but these retailers are letting you register interest early
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Information on how to potentially get pre-order details for the Nintendo Switch 2 is provided, implying a new version of the Nintendo Switch is being developed or prepared for release.

articles.title: 'Better eShop' launches as an improved alternative to the Nintendo Switch store with better browsing ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Nintendo Life launched 'Better eShop', which is presented as an improved alternative to Nintendo's existing online store. This represents a new service offering from Nintendo Life.

articles.title: Pyth Network Introduces Lazer Oracle to Outpace Centralized Exchanges in Speed and Efficiency
articles.author: Crypto Economy
articles.summary: Pyth Network launched Lazer Oracle, providing ultra-low-latency price feeds for DeFi. Lazer Oracle features customizable frequency channels and detailed market data, enabling DeFi protocols to compete with centralized exchanges. This introduction marks a significant advancement in real-time data for DeFi.

articles.title: Alexa-Enabled Dreame Robot Vacuum and Mop Combo Is $500 Off, Marking Its Lowest Price Ever
articles.author: Gizmodo
articles.summary: A robot vacuum and mop combo is available with a 56% discount. The offering suggests a promotional campaign, and potentially a product introduction to a wider audience.

articles.title: See a video taste test of Progresso's limited-time chicken noodle soup-flavored candy
articles.author: Cincinnati.com
articles.summary: Progresso has released a limited-edition chicken noodle soup-flavored hard candy, marketed as 'soup you can suck on,' during the flu and cold season. This innovative product aims to provide a novel way to experience the taste of chicken noodle soup.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra to beat iPhone 16 Pro Max with BIG mobile AI features: ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing for its Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event, teasing the launch of the new Galaxy S25 series. The company is inviting interested buyers to pre-reserve the Galaxy S25 series models for additional benefits.

articles.title: Redmi Note 14 Series launching January 20: A New era of durability and AI photography awaits
articles.author: STAR REPORTER
articles.summary: Xiaomi Kenya is preparing to launch the Redmi Note 14 Series on January 20, featuring a pro-grade AI camera system, enhanced durability, high-performance chipset, and long-lasting battery. The series will run on Android 14 with Xiaomi's HyperOS, providing a seamless user experience.

articles.title: Willkommen visit new owner of Gypsy Girl
articles.summary: Jackie Berg, the new owner of Gypsy Girl Consignment Boutique, plans to rebrand the store, expand clothing options, bring in more artists, potentially add lightweight furniture, and improve the lighting and flow. These changes aim to enhance the customer experience and cater to the community.
